Package core

Class Summary
AbstractTile Represents a single, abstract tile.
LayoutManager Responsible for managing the layout of the current frame.
Main Main class.
MapIO Handles loading and saving maps.
MapPanel This panel holds all of the MapTiles which can be drawn to.
MapperFrame The JFrame which serves as the main GUI for the application.
MapTile This represents a tile which is drawn to the MapPanel.
NewMapDialog A map dialog which is displayed to help in creating a new map.
Splash A simple class for displaying a splash screen
Tile A tile which can be selected in one of the TilePanels.
TilePanel A panel which shows all of the currently loaded tiles to select from.
TileSheet Contains all of the information about the tile sheet that was loaded, such as image loaded, tile width and height, and the transparent color associated with it
